comment.body: Problem is, most ways of using your money will induce consumption, production, and therefore ecological degradation in some manner or another. Keeping money in the bank is no better because banks invest this money in the way that makes them the most profits, which is usually very anti ecological as well. I'd say the best way to use your money is probably to buy some land which might have previously been damaged by industrial activity and take care of it, which could just mean letting it be so that plants and animals can come back.
